content: The Earth Wolf's Spirit allows you to use the wolf's charge ability to ram and stagger enemies. Even big bosses go down after this move, allowing you to get another combo in before they get up. It's an excellent Spirit and one of the best in the game. You can also use the ability to smash the wall in the First Prince of Flowing Sands arena if the boss doesn't destroy it and reveal the secret area itself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Earth Wolf's Spirit allows you to use the wolf's charge ability to ram and stagger enemies. Even big bosses go down after this move, allowing you to get another combo in before they get up. It's an excellent Spirit and one of the best in the game. You can also use the ability to smash the wall in the First Prince of Flowing Sands arena if the boss doesn't destroy it and reveal the secret area itself.
